name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in security, compliance, and cloud infrastructure management within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven expertise in **Azure**, **M365**, **PowerShell**, **Intune**, and **Autopilot**, focusing on Zero-Trust architecture and identity management solutions. Experienced in implementing security measures including **EDR**, **XDR**, and **SIEM** to enhance organizational compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Skilled in infrastructure as code (IaC) practices to streamline deployment and operational processes.
Additionally, I bring a strong background in developing high-performance, AI/ML-driven platforms using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with diverse experience in frontend and backend technologies, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at establishing microservices architectures and CI/CD pipelines, alongside hands-on experience in deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS**.
